kaapi_access.h File Reference

Classes

struct  DFG::AccessMode
 Access modeMode of access to shared data. Using binary representation [bit3 | bit2 | bit1 | bit0], bit1 is set iff mode is a concurrent mode (r or cw) bit3 is set iff mode is a postponed, other bits are used for identification. More...
class  DFG::Access
 Access to global data. More...

namespace  DFG
 

Basic class to allows the definition of the data flow graph.

The Util namespace contains definitions to port the library onto an operating system.

Defines

#define KAAPI_BITSFOR_SHAREDMODE   4
#define KAAPI_GET_ACCESS_MODE(a)   (a & 7)
#define KAAPI_ACCESS_POSTPONED(a)   ((a & 8) !=0)
#define KAAPI_ACCESS_POSTPONED2(a, b)   (((a|b) & 8) !=0)
#define KAAPI_ACCESS_WRITE(a)   (((a & 7) == DFG::AccessMode::w) || ((a & 7) == DFG::AccessMode::cw))
#define KAAPI_ACCESS_CONCURRENT_WRITE(a)   ((a & 7) == DFG::AccessMode::cw)
#define KAAPI_ACCESS_READ(a)   (((a & 7) == DFG::AccessMode::r) || ((a & 7) == DFG::AccessMode::rw))
#define KAAPI_ACCESS_READWRITE(a)   ((a & 7) == DFG::AccessMode::rw)
#define KAAPI_ACCESS_CONCURRENT(a, b)   ((((a)==(b)) && ( ((b) & 2) !=0 )) || KAAPI_ACCESS_POSTPONED2(a,b))

#define KAAPI_ACCESS_CONCURRENT ( a,
b   )     ((((a)==(b)) && ( ((b) & 2) !=0 )) || KAAPI_ACCESS_POSTPONED2(a,b))

Return true if two modes are concurrents a == b and a or b is R or CW or a or b is postponed.

#define KAAPI_ACCESS_CONCURRENT_WRITE ( a   )     ((a & 7) == DFG::AccessMode::cw)

Return true if mode is write mode : cw, cwp

#define KAAPI_ACCESS_POSTPONED ( a   )     ((a & 8) !=0)

Return true if mode is a postponed mode

#define KAAPI_ACCESS_POSTPONED2 ( a,
b   )     (((a|b) & 8) !=0)
#define KAAPI_ACCESS_READ ( a   )     (((a & 7) == DFG::AccessMode::r) || ((a & 7) == DFG::AccessMode::rw))

Return true if mode is read mode : r, rp, rw, rpwp

#define KAAPI_ACCESS_READWRITE ( a   )     ((a & 7) == DFG::AccessMode::rw)
